title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 31, 2025

items.title: Awesome Sysadmin
items.content_text:
### Software / Backups

*   [Backrest](https://garethgeorge.github.io/backrest/) - Backrest is a web UI and orchestrator for restic backup. ([Source Code (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/garethgeorge/backrest)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker/Go`

### Software / Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment

*   [Terrateam](https://terrateam.io) - GitOps-first automation platform for Terraform and OpenTofu workflows with support for self-hosted runners. ([Source Code (⭐811)](https://github.com/terrateamio/terrateam)) `MPL-2.0` `OCaml/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Backups

  • Backrest - Backrest is a web UI and orchestrator for restic backup. (Source Code (⭐3.3k)) GPL-3.0 Docker/Go

Software / Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [HCoroutines (⭐33)](https://github.com/Inspiaaa/HCoroutines) - Powerful C# coroutine library for Godot.
*   [ThemeGen (⭐134)](https://github.com/Inspiaaa/ThemeGen) - Easily create themes using GDScript code, allowing you to reuse styles, recombine them, and effortlessly reuse and share colours between components.
items.content_html:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • HCoroutines (⭐33) - Powerful C# coroutine library for Godot.
  • ThemeGen (⭐134) - Easily create themes using GDScript code, allowing you to reuse styles, recombine them, and effortlessly reuse and share colours between components.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

*   [WYGIWYH (⭐446)](https://github.com/eitchtee/WYGIWYH) - Simple and powerful finance tracker. ([Demo](https://wygiwyh-demo.herculino.com/)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Django`

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Authentication & Identity

*   [SSOJet](https://ssojet.com/) - Enterprise SSO without rebuilding auth. The free plan includes unlimited monthly active users, unlimited organizations, 2 SSO & 2 SCIM connections.
*   [SuperTokens](https://supertokens.io/) - Open-source and hosted email & Oauth authentication with prebuilt UI. [![SuperTokens](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/supertokens/supertokens-core?style=flat-square\&logo=github\&labelColor=%230D1117\&color=%23161B22)](https://github.com/supertokens/supertokens-core)
items.content_html:
Authentication & Identity

  • SSOJet - Enterprise SSO without rebuilding auth. The free plan includes unlimited monthly active users, unlimited organizations, 2 SSO & 2 SCIM connections.
  • SuperTokens - Open-source and hosted email & Oauth authentication with prebuilt UI.

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Applications / Database

*   [DB3 Network (⭐378)](https://github.com/dbpunk-labs/db3) - DB3 is a community-driven blockchain layer2 decentralized database network [![GitHub Workflow Status (with event)](https://github.com/dbpunk-labs/db3/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/dbpunk-labs/db3/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

### Applications / Security tools

*   [0xdea/oneiromancer (⭐78)](https://github.com/0xdea/oneiromancer) \[[oneiromancer](https://crates.io/crates/oneiromancer)] - Reverse engineering assistant that uses a locally running LLM to aid with source code analysis [![build](https://github.com/0xdea/oneiromancer/actions/workflows/build.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/0xdea/oneiromancer/actions/workflows/build.yml)

items.title: Awesome Angular

### Captcha / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [altcha (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/altcha-org/altcha) - GDPR, WCAG 2.2 AA, and EAA compliant, self-hosted CAPTCHA alternative with PoW mechanism and advanced anti-spam filter.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Concepts / AI Concept Representation

*   [Do Llamas Work in English? On the Latent Language of Multilingual Transformers](https://aclanthology.org/2024.acl-long.820/) - ***ACL'24***, 2024. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=5847238732288003106)]. A preliminary work empirically showing that the intermediate embeddings of multilingual Transformers (1) start far away from output token embeddings; (2) already allow for decoding a semantically correct next token in the middle layers, but give higher probability to its version in English than in the input language; (3) finally move into an input-language-specific region of the embedding space. Also, the embedding of abstract concept space lies closer to English than to other languages.
items.content_html:
Concepts / AI Concept Representation

  • Do Llamas Work in English? On the Latent Language of Multilingual Transformers - ACL'24, 2024. [All Versions]. A preliminary work empirically showing that the intermediate embeddings of multilingual Transformers (1) start far away from output token embeddings; (2) already allow for decoding a semantically correct next token in the middle layers, but give higher probability to its version in English than in the input language; (3) finally move into an input-language-specific region of the embedding space. Also, the embedding of abstract concept space lies closer to English than to other languages.
